name: Clement Rousselle
bio: I love Swift for the new approach it gives to iOS development. I started using Swift when 1.0 was announced, excited to help developpers learn this super fun language!

name: Corey Davis
bio: I started with swift 2.0 and have been in love with it ever since. It offers such a powerful, clean, and elegant approach. Building the swift community is one of my greatest professional ambitions.
